Detailed Description

The header of the GLFW 3 API.

This is the header file of the GLFW 3 API. It defines all its types and declares all its functions.

For more information about how to use this file, see build_include.

Define Documentation

#define GLFW_FALSE   0

Zero.

Zero. Seriously. You don't _need_ to use this symbol in your code. It's just just semantic sugar for the number 0. You can use `0` or `false` or `_False` or `GL_FALSE` or whatever you want.

#define GLFW_TRUE   1

One.

One. Seriously. You don't _need_ to use this symbol in your code. It's just semantic sugar for the number 1. You can use `1` or `true` or `_True` or `GL_TRUE` or whatever you want.
